page.title: 09BOYS FASHION
page.content: We asked some boys from our school if they are conscious about their clothes.Out of 32 boys 3 boys didn't mind what they wore and the other 29 did.Then we asked what sort of fashion they like and they all said Casual. Casual clothes are baggy trouses and jeans, loose tops and T shirts and slip on shoes.Makes of clothes are in fashion too e.g Nike, Puma,Lecost and Fred Perry.All makes have trade marks e.g. Lecost have a little green crocodile, Puma have an upside down tick,Nike have a tick up the right way,Fred Perry have a reef.It is not only clothes that are in fashion, leisure is also in the fashion such as B.M.X. (Bycle Motor Cross) .Groups of eight boys/girls race round a track.There is also Free Style which is tricks.
